name: Post Date Range Filter
author: Md. Shahinur Islam

sections.description:
Any Post or any custom post category you can view Post Date Range Filter. Take full control over your WordPress site, build any shortcode paste you can imagine – no programming knowledge required.

Docs & Support

You can find docs, FAQ and more detailed information about Post Date Range Filter on FB. If you were unable to find the answer to your question on the FAQ or in any of the documentation, you should check the support forum on WordPress.org. If you can’t locate any topics that pertain to your particular issue, post a new topic for it.

Why Use Post Date Range Filter?

Post Date Range Filter gives you all the features needed to create Post date filtering without any hassle.

Post Date Range Filter Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Post Date Range Filter and find it useful, please consider making a donation. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support. Find on gitlab. Gitlab
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire post-date-range-filter folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Settings’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the plugin web site.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Post Date Range Filter? Use these support channels appropriately.

Post Date Range Filter is responsive?

Yes this plugin are fully responsive and support every mobile device.

What about this plugin?

This plugin is post or custom post type any categories for filtering by date.
sections.changelog:
1.01

  • WP Version Update

1.0

  • Dynamic add post type.
  • Dynamic add texonomy.
  • Generate shortcode place and show the main file.
